# Routines

```{python}
import pandas as pd

workouts = "./static/workouts.xlsx"
w1 = pd.read_excel(workouts, sheet_name=0)

```

The following regimen outlines a 4 week lift cycle. The routine is a slightly modified version of [this](https://jackedgorilla.com/chris-pratt-workout-routine/). Non-lift days should be supplemented with active recovery workouts.
